name: 10nis
description:
Save the world by proving you are the best tennis pigeon in the flock.

Instructions:

press [SPACE]

This game was made in one week for Kongregate Game Jam 2 (Nov 4-11, 2016)

Theme: The number 10

Modifier 1: Mouth Sounds

Modifier 2: No violence

Modifier 3: Less than two buttons

Credits:

Tim Chu -- Programming

Brian Hung -- Art

Jason Yee -- Audio
